parameters.query:
UPDATE user_contexts 
SET 
  context_data = jsonb_set(
    $${{ $('Update Interaction').item.json.updatedContext.toJsonString() }}$$::jsonb,
    '{statusBot}',
    '"free"'::jsonb
  ),
  updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE wa_id = '{{ $('Update Interaction').item.json.wa_id }}'
RETURNING *;
